name: Growlithe
flavorText:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.flavorText:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.
